# Sediment grain size distribution  
Higher proportions of fine grained sediment are associated with higher cohesion and sediment retention. This affects how quickly eroded sediment can move down the river channel and may indicate the appropriate sediment management strategy. 

## Data requirements/sources
Site based assessments
